meanings.definition: A traditional Southeast Asian fruit and vegetable salad.
meanings.sent1: I enjoyed a delicious rojak at the Asian food festival.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes a tasty rojak with mangoes and cucumbers.
meanings.sent3: The colorful rojak looked like a rainbow on my plate.
meanings.sent4: Her rojak of flavors danced on my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The fresh ingredients in the rojak made it a refreshing treat.

meanings.definition: A mixture or assortment of different elements or styles.
meanings.sent1: The party was a rojak of music, food, and games.
meanings.sent2: His outfit was a rojak of patterns and colors.
meanings.sent3: The painting was a rojak of bold strokes and vibrant hues.
meanings.sent4: Her speech was a rojak of emotions, from laughter to tears.
meanings.sent5: The room was a rojak of scents, from flowers to spices.

meanings.definition: A type of Malaysian and Singaporean street food dish.
meanings.sent1: I can't wait to try the famous rojak from the street vendor.
meanings.sent2: The aroma of the rojak filled the bustling market.
meanings.sent3: Eating rojak by the roadside felt like a true local experience.
meanings.sent4: The spicy kick in the rojak woke up my taste buds.
meanings.sent5: The sweet and savory flavors in the rojak were a delightful surprise.
